title: How to Catch Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf in Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire

steps.title: Get the Eon Flute.
steps.content: Get the Eon Flute. You get the Eon Flute after completing the Primal Groudon/Kyogre storyline at Sootopolis City.

steps.title: Have three Pokémon in your party with maximum happiness.
steps.content: Have three Pokémon in your party with maximum happiness . You can have your Pokémon's happiness level rated from a friendship rater in Verdanturf Town and Pacifidlog Town.

steps.title: Use the Eon Flute to summon Latios/Latias and soar into the sky.
steps.content: Use the Eon Flute to summon Latios/Latias and soar into the sky.

steps.title: Soar to Sootopolis City.
steps.content: Soar to Sootopolis City. Nearby, you'll find a cave called the Nameless Cavern. Land here.

steps.title: Go inside the cave, where you'll find a portal.
steps.content: Go inside the cave, where you'll find a portal. Interact with the portal to encounter Uxie, Mesprit, or Azelf, depending on the time of day. Uxie appears from 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM, Azelf appears from 9:00 PM to 3:59 AM, and Mesprit appears from 4:00 AM to 7:59 PM.
